verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Abide with me: fast falls the eventide; the darkness deepens; Lord, with me abide. When other helpers fail and comforts flee, Help of the helpless, O abide with me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Swift to its close ebbs out life's little day; earth's joys grow dim; its glories pass away. Change and decay in all around I see. O Thou who changest not, abide with me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I need Thy presence ev'ry passing hour; what but Thy grace can foil the tempter's pow'r? Who like Thyself my Guide and Stay can be? Through cloud and sunshine, O abide with me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I fear no foe, with Thee at hand to bless; ills have no weight, and tears no bitterness. Where is death's sting? Where, grave, thy victory? I triumph still, if Thou abide with me.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Hold Thou Thy cross before my closing eyes; shine through the gloom and point me to the skies. Heav'n's morning breaks, and earth's vain shadows flee. In life, in death, O Lord, abide with me.
